top_suggestions.title: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
top_suggestions.description: As Harry Potter begins his sixth year at Hogwarts, he discovers an old book marked as "the property of the Half-Blood Prince" and begins to learn more about Lord Voldemort's dark past.

top_suggestions.title: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
top_suggestions.description: Harry Potter finds himself competing in a hazardous tournament between rival schools of magic, but he is distracted by recurring nightmares.

top_suggestions.title: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
top_suggestions.description: With their warning about Lord Voldemort's return scoffed at, Harry and Dumbledore are targeted by the Wizard authorities as an authoritarian bureaucrat slowly seizes power at Hogwarts.

top_suggestions.title: Lego Harry Potter and the Philosopher's Stone
top_suggestions.description: Harry Potter, a young wizard who discovers his magical heritage on his eleventh birthday, goes to Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry to learn magic.

top_suggestions.title: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
top_suggestions.description: Harry Potter lives his second year at Hogwarts with Ron and Hermione when a message on the wall announces that the legendary Chamber of Secrets has been opened. The trio soon realize that, to save the school, it will take a lot of courage.

top_suggestions.title: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
top_suggestions.description: Harry Potter, Ron and Hermione return to Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry for their third year of study, where they delve into the mystery surrounding an escaped prisoner who poses a dangerous threat to the young wizard.

top_suggestions.title: Pirates of the Caribbean: Dead Man's Chest
top_suggestions.description: Jack Sparrow races to recover the heart of Davy Jones to avoid enslaving his soul to Jones' service, as other friends and foes seek the heart for their own agenda as well.

top_suggestions.title: Pirates of the Caribbean: At World's End
top_suggestions.description: Will Turner, Elizabeth Swann, Hector Barbossa, and the crew of the Black Pearl try and rescue Jack from davy jones locker and prepare to fight Lord Cutler Beckett, who controls Davy Jones and the Flying Dutchman.

top_suggestions.title: Pirates of the Caribbean: The Curse of the Black Pearl
top_suggestions.description: Blacksmith Will Turner teams up with eccentric pirate "Captain" Jack Sparrow to save Elizabeth Swann, the governor's daughter and his love, from Jack's former pirate allies, who are now undead.

top_suggestions.title: Rango
top_suggestions.description: Rango is an ordinary chameleon who accidentally winds up in the town of Dirt, a lawless outpost in the Wild West in desperate need of a new sheriff.

top_suggestions.title: The Lone Ranger
top_suggestions.description: Native American warrior Tonto recounts the untold tales that transformed John Reid, a man of the law, into a legend of justice.

top_suggestions.title: Ed Wood
top_suggestions.description: Ambitious but troubled movie director Edward D. Wood Jr. tries his best to fulfill his dreams despite his lack of talent.

top_suggestions.title: Titanic
top_suggestions.description: A seventeen-year-old aristocrat falls in love with a kind but poor artist aboard the luxurious, ill-fated R.M.S. Titanic.

top_suggestions.title: The Dilemma
top_suggestions.description: A man discovers that his best friend's wife is having an affair.

top_suggestions.title: The Day the Earth Stood Still
top_suggestions.description: A remake of the 1951 classic science fiction film about an alien visitor and his giant robot counterpart who visit Earth.

top_suggestions.title: Revolutionary Road
top_suggestions.description: A young couple living in a Connecticut suburb during the mid-1950s struggle to come to terms with their personal problems while trying to raise their two children.

top_suggestions.title: Heavenly Creatures
top_suggestions.description: Two teenage girls share a unique bond: their parents, concerned that the friendship is too intense, separate them, and the girls take revenge.
